Does organic wine taste better? A study whose findings have been widely misinterpreted

Jamie Goode has a different stance over a debated report.

item.title: Evernote's CEO on 'unlocking the potential of every idea'
item.description:
Evernote's CEO on 'unlocking the potential of every idea'

It's been a year since you joined Evernote. What's the progress been like, and where do you see the company headed? I'm tremendously pleased. I was pretty quiet when I showed up. I was focused on the core product, the team and the path to sustainability.

item.title: My Two Cents on Instagram Stories and the Evolution of Social Platform
item.description:
My Two Cents on Instagram Stories and the Evolution of Social Platform

Yesterday, Instagram, the Facebook-owned photo sharing app, released it's latest platform update: Instagram Stories. It's a new feature that allows you to share photos and videos with your followers in a manner that is incredibly similar to Snapchat. Like Snapchat, this content will disappear after 24 hours.
